com.twiddles.ganesha.gui
Class AddWizard

java.lang.Object
  com.twiddles.ganesha.gui.AddWizard
class AddWizard
extends java.lang.Object

Wizard interface to let users add new resources, properties or objects. The methods in this class will display a wizard prompting users for information needed to create a new resource, property or object on a step by step basis. Users have the option to go back and ammed or change any values entered in previous steps or to cancel the the process and return to the main Ganesha GUI.

Method Detail

addResource

public RDFResource addResource()
Runs a wizard prompting the user for value needed to create a resource.

Returns:
the new resource or null if the user cancelled.

addProperty

public RDFProperty addProperty(RDFResource myRes)
Runs a wizard prompting the user for value needed to create a property. The property will be added to the given resource.

Returns:
the new resource or null if the user cancelled.

addObject

public RDFObject addObject()
Runs a wizard prompting the user to make an object.

Returns:
the new object or null if the user cancelled.
